boat.name: Hannah of Rock
boat.full_description:
The third of only four marine ply Cornish Crabbers, Hannah is the only one known to survive.

When Hannah of Rock was lifted out of the water at the end of 2019 it became apparent that the steel centre board was blown with a large amount of rust and needed repairing/replacing. The rudder bearing male and female parts, which had always been worn, had reached a stage that they would have to be repaired/renewed.

She was bought by Felixstowe Boat Yard for restoration. Once the repairs are done the boat should be a great purchase for someone interested in such a classic Gaff Rig.
boat.short_description: Built in ply, Hannah of Rock provided the mould for all subsequent mark 1 Cornish Crabbers.
